response.original_title: An Evening with my Great Aunt Bedelia
response.overview: From the vault of Warlock Home Video comes a smorgasbord of death!  When Edith Gerhauser receives a mysterious letter inviting her to the estate of her deceased grandmother, she did not expect to be the main course on a platter full of blood and mayhem. Now  she must come face to face with her familyâ€™s darkest secret - crusty demon witch Aunt Bedelia.  Writer, Director Tobe Lerone is back to take you through the basements of hell and beyond and then leave you screaming for more. A flick so frightening The Warlock himself hid beneath his cloak for hours. Bedelia Is One Twisted Sister
response.title: An Evening with my Great Aunt Bedelia
